original_title: Malcata: Conto de Uma Serra Solitária
overview: A journey that seeks to unravel the history of the region for 600 million years. Included in this report are the evidence of prehistoric animals, the daily struggle against the lack of resources, and the past of the Iberian lynx - the most threatened feline in the world, which still lives in the memory of the inhabitants.
title: Malcata: Tale of a Lonely Hill
